Row.Text: In addition to the regular abilities of the Stable, the Ducal Stable is cheaper to build, costs no maintenance, increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold on Pasture tiles, and provides +15 XP for Mounted Units. Only the Polish may build it.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]In addition to the regular abilities of the Stable, the Ducal Stable is cheaper to build, costs no maintenance, increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold on Pasture tiles, and provides +15 XP for Mounted Units. Only the Polish may build it.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]In addition to the regular abilities of the Stable, the Ducal Stable is cheaper to build, costs no maintenance, increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold on Pasture tiles, and provides +15 XP for Mounted Units. Only the Polish may build it.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]In addition to the regular abilities of the Stable, the Ducal Stable is cheaper to build, costs no maintenance, increases [ICON_GOLD] Gold on Pasture tiles, and provides +15 XP for Mounted Units. Only the Polish may build it.

Unique Polish Stable replacement. Cheaper to construct, and requires no [ICON_GOLD] Gold maintenance.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +15 XP for Mounted Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses, [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, and [ICON_RES_COW] Cattle worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have at least one of these resources improved with a Pasture.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]Unique Polish Stable replacement. Cheaper to construct, and requires no [ICON_GOLD] Gold maintenance.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +15 XP for Mounted Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses, [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, and [ICON_RES_COW] Cattle worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have at least one of these resources improved with a Pasture.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]Unique Polish Stable replacement. Cheaper to construct, and requires no [ICON_GOLD] Gold maintenance.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +15 XP for Mounted Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses, [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, and [ICON_RES_COW] Cattle worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have at least one of these resources improved with a Pasture.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]Unique Polish Stable replacement. Cheaper to construct, and requires no [ICON_GOLD] Gold maintenance.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +15 XP for Mounted Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses, [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, and [ICON_RES_COW] Cattle worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production and +1 [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have at least one of these resources improved with a Pasture.

The Stable increases the speed of production of mounted units and provides +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Pasture resource tiles. It can only be constructed in a city near to one or more improved [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horse, [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, or [ICON_RES_COW] Cattle resources.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](DE_DE text) [ENDCOLOR]The Stable increases the speed of production of mounted units and provides +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Pasture resource tiles. It can only be constructed in a city near to one or more improved [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horse, [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, or [ICON_RES_COW] Cattle resources.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](PL_PL text) [ENDCOLOR]The Stable increases the speed of production of mounted units and provides +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Pasture resource tiles. It can only be constructed in a city near to one or more improved [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horse, [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, or [ICON_RES_COW] Cattle resources.

[COLOR_WARNING_TEXT](RU_RU text) [ENDCOLOR]The Stable increases the speed of production of mounted units and provides +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production from Pasture resource tiles. It can only be constructed in a city near to one or more improved [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horse, [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, or [ICON_RES_COW] Cattle resources.

+15% [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production when building Mounted Units.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Each source of [ICON_RES_HORSE] Horses, [ICON_RES_SHEEP] Sheep, and [ICON_RES_COW] Cattle worked by this City produce +1 [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]City must have at least one of these resources improved with a Pasture.
